content.raw:
Original [issue 21](https://code.google.com/p/segtools/issues/detail?id=21) created by ericr86 on 2011-04-13T17:18:57.000Z:

Just installed segway 1.0.3, genomedata 1.2.2 and segtools 1.1.6.

Get the following error running the segtools test suite; apparently segtools.bed_compare was deprecated at some point??? and the test not updated.

root@domU-12-31-39-07-1E-71:/segway-build/src/segtools-1.1.6/test# ./run_all.py 
Found test modules: ['test_bed_compare', 'test_overlap', 'test_feature_distance']
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./run_all.py", line 34, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "./run_all.py", line 25, in main
    suite = unittest.defaultTestLoader.loadTestsFromNames(modulenames)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/unittest.py", line 613, in loadTestsFromNames
    suites = [self.loadTestsFromName(name, module) for name in names]
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/unittest.py", line 576, in loadTestsFromName
    module = __import__('.'.join(parts_copy))
  File "/segway-build/src/segtools-1.1.6/test/test_bed_compare.py", line 11, in <module>
    from segtools.bed_compare import edit_distance
ImportError: No module named bed_compare
content.html:
Original [issue 21](https://code.google.com/p/segtools/issues/detail?id=21) created by ericr86 on 2011-04-13T17:18:57.000Z:

Just installed segway 1.0.3, genomedata 1.2.2 and segtools 1.1.6.

Get the following error running the segtools test suite; apparently segtools.bed_compare was deprecated at some point??? and the test not updated.

root@domU-12-31-39-07-1E-71:/segway-build/src/segtools-1.1.6/test# ./run_all.py Found test modules: ['test_bed_compare', 'test_overlap', 'test_feature_distance'] Traceback (most recent call last): File "./run_all.py", line 34, in <module> sys.exit(main()) File "./run_all.py", line 25, in main suite = unittest.defaultTestLoader.loadTestsFromNames(modulenames) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/unittest.py", line 613, in loadTestsFromNames suites = [self.loadTestsFromName(name, module) for name in names] File "/usr/lib/python2.6/unittest.py", line 576, in loadTestsFromName module = import('.'.join(parts_copy)) File "/segway-build/src/segtools-1.1.6/test/test_bed_compare.py", line 11, in <module> from segtools.bed_compare import edit_distance ImportError: No module named bed_compare
